name: SwingCore
description:
Cyberpunk first person swinging game

Objective: Activate 4 generators on top of buildings before the time runs out.

Instructions:  

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to Look
  • X to deflect enemy projectiles
  • X to activate generators
  • Left Mouse click fires rope
  • Right mouse Click destroys all rope created
  • F gives you a boost
  • Q reels you towards rope once attached
  • E moves you back from rope once attached
  • Q and F with multiple ropes attached will give you an increased movement boost
  • The flying monsters will grab and kill you if you get too close
  • If you fall too far into the fog you will die
